item.title: Get your message right – Effective Marketing Strategy
item.description: Creating an effective marketing strategyduring a recession is tough. When you’re faced with budget cuts to your marketing spend or trying to figure out what you can do with no budget then you need a plan. The third step to this plan is to get your message rightWhat is your customer telling you? Customers are always looking for 2 things – The right priceor a better offer. Westerners may not be as good at bargaining as some cultures are, but we all want to know we got a good deal.
